word:
Now that we have come to the East we will remain for about six weeks longer. There is an important meeting at South Lancaster, Eastern Conference. That gives me two weeks in New York City. I have two Sabbaths and two Sundays there.--Letter 217, 1901, pp. 1, 2. (To Herbert and Lillian Lacey, November 4, 1901.) 


                                    -317-
